subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dodgers reliever Joe Beimel, who as a young baseball fan revered Barry Bonds, does not wither when he sees Bonds standing 60 feet 6 inches away from him.
snippet: Dodgers reliever Joe Beimel, who as a young baseball fan revered Barry Bonds, does not wither when he sees Bonds standing 60 feet 6 inches away from him.
